episodes.title: Her Ihanet Sevgiyle Baslar
episodes.plot: Ezel and his team arrive to Cyprus to avenge Ömer, who has been betrayed by his best friends in 1997, twelve years ago.

episodes.title: Seni Seven Senin Kurbanindir
episodes.plot: Ezel begins his revenge. We get to know Eysan's past.

episodes.title: Ask Ölümden Güclüdür
episodes.plot: Eysan's motivation for betraying Ömer 12 years earlier is revealed. Ezel learns Eysan's son has endangered himself and decides whether to intervene.

episodes.title: En Zoru Eve Dönmektir
episodes.plot: Back in 1997, an unlikely protector defends Ömer when he is targeted in prison, and Cengiz takes desperate measures to ensure Eysan stays with him.

episodes.title: Ask mi Kaderi Kovalar, Kader mi Aski
episodes.plot: In 2001, Ömer is mentored by fellow inmate Ramiz and gets a surprise visitor. Four years later, a riot allows him to escape his sentence and identity.

episodes.title: Hayaller Hayaletler
episodes.plot: When Bahar suffers a health crisis, Ezel comes to her rescue. An unexpected stop during a road trip with Cengiz brings Ezel to his family's home.

episodes.title: Gitmek/Kalmak
episodes.plot: Ezel selects a target. A newly released Ramiz recalls Ezel's failed attempt at getting revenge in 2005. Bahar steals some time alone with Ezel.

episodes.title: Akreple kurbaga
episodes.plot: Ezel learns Bahar is hiding a secret, and finds a way to spend time with Eysan. Unable to find any dirt on Ezel, Ali investigates his driver, Kamil.

episodes.title: En kötü ihtimal
episodes.plot: Ezel takes Eysan to a nostalgic place. Ali digs up dirt on Ezel's assistant, Sebnem, and makes her an offer. Mert and his mother run into Eysan.

episodes.title: Sadakat
episodes.plot: When Mert's mother, Meliha, is introduced to Ezel at a get-together, she has a strong reaction that makes Cengiz wary. Eysan finds a worrying note.

episodes.title: Utanç
episodes.plot: Cengiz and Ali take the bait that Ezel has dangled in front of them. A disturbing text message prompts Eysan to visit her father.

episodes.title: Yalniz kalmak
episodes.plot: When Ali confronts Eysan for visiting her father, she fears the worst has happened to him. Ezel secretly visits his mother, but Mert catches him.

episodes.title: Kaçinilmaz
episodes.plot: Ezel takes Bahar to an orphanage linked to his past. Ali recalls returning to work for Cengiz in 2006, and their love-hate relationship since then.

episodes.title: ilk Günah
episodes.plot: Cengiz remembers running a DNA test on his son in 2006. While seducing Bahar, Ezel feels conflicted. Cengiz catches Eysan taking birth control pills.

episodes.title: Çikar yol
episodes.plot: Mert's plans for writing an article about Ömer put his life at risk. Eysan's father secretly develops a relationship with his grandson.

episodes.title: Dönüs yolu
episodes.plot: When Cengiz gets in trouble at a nightclub, Ezel's loyalties from his former life as Ömer are tested. Ezel has a heart-to-heart talk with Bahar.

episodes.title: Geçmisin ayak izleri
episodes.plot: Mert interviews a reluctant Cengiz, Eysan and Ali for his article. Afterward, Ezel and Ali accompany Mert on a fact-finding mission to the prison.

episodes.title: Gitmesine izin vermek
episodes.plot: In order to protect Mert, Ezel makes a painful decision. Eysan follows a hunch about her husband. Mert takes a risk to investigate an anonymous tip.

episodes.title: Gercekleri Ogrenme Zamani
episodes.plot: Worried about her son's future, Eysan decides to introduce Can to Ömer's family. Can reveals to his grandfather that he saw what was on the videotape.

episodes.title: Emanet
episodes.plot: Eysan spots her husband with another woman. Cengiz is asked to choose between his friendship with Ali and his partnership with Ezel. Ali tests Ezel.

episodes.title: Ailede bir olüm
episodes.plot: Can steals the videotape. Mert changes his mind and publishes an article on Ömer. A haunting message leads Ali to believe he's been cursed.

episodes.title: Masumiyet
episodes.plot: Ezel's mother confronts him about his letter to Mert. Ezel asks Bahar to prove her love for him. Paranoia consumes Ali. Eysan salvages her pride.

episodes.title: Oyunbozan
episodes.plot: Ali misinterprets the surprise awaiting him at the casino. Eysan's father visits Cengiz with a demand. Ezel leads Eysan to make a shameful move.

episodes.title: Baslasin intikam
episodes.plot: Bahar accuses Ezel of breaking a promise. Cengiz scrambles to secure a multi-million-dollar loan in time for submitting a bid for the hotel project.

episodes.title: Gercegin Gucu
episodes.plot: Bahar goes on an upsetting dinner date. Eysan reveals the depth of her hate for her husband. Ezel's sidekicks, Sebnem and Kamil, are caught off guard.

episodes.title: En Onemli Sey
episodes.plot: To save his own life, Cengiz negotiates with his father-in-law. A mission tests Tevfik's loyalties. A conflicted Ezel makes a confession to Eysan.

episodes.title: Kimin Tarafindasin
episodes.plot: Cengiz and his father-in-law plan to bait Ezel. Eysan's aunt calls Ezel's mother. Ali tries to flee Turkey. Eysan succumbs to her attraction to Ezel.

episodes.title: Bizden Biri
episodes.plot: Tevfik recalls his original crime. Ezel gets Ali to work for him without knowing it. Serdar finds an informant with knowledge of Ezel's past.

episodes.title: Surgun
episodes.plot: After learning Ezel had a second mentor, Serdar and Ali pay her a visit. Mert meets with troubled orphan Eren. Eysan relives a moment from her past.

episodes.title: Ozlemek
episodes.plot: Eren steals a gun and goes to visit Mert. Ali and Serdar raid the home of Ezel's plastic surgeon. To find out who Serdar is, Tevfik picks his pocket.

episodes.title: Yasama Sebebi
episodes.plot: Bahar tells Ezel about her upbringing. Mert figures out who betrayed Ömer. Tevfik learns of the videotape. Serdar tracks down Ezel's old taxi driver.

episodes.title: Haksizliga Karsi
episodes.plot: After getting the proof he needs to put away his old friends, Ezel must decide whether to continue with his vengeance or return home to his family.

episodes.title: Ikinci hayat
episodes.plot: At the casino, Ezel and Cengiz literally put their darkest secrets on the table. Ali and Tevfik try to find Serdar before he can make his escape.
